name: Zombie Apocalypse Survival - Last Survivor Diaries
name_original: Zombie Apocalypse Survival - Last Survivor Diaries
description:
Survivor, we’re glad that you’re not dead! The apocalypse came when we least expected it, survivor, all we’re left with is hardcore survival... The virus outbreak wiped out almost the entire population leaving behind nothing but dead wasteland where each survivor is forced to fight for survival against zombies. The biological weapon has killed billions and turned others into an undead. But you are not the only survivor! Some people are also fighting for survival against the walking dead. We’re already spread too thin in this apocalypse to help you, but we’ll give you knowledge vital to survive in the dead wasteland. The fight for your life will be HARD. Survive, explore, build shelters, craft & upgrade weapons (don't forget about armor) and don't let them kill you! Take this survival protocol, may the apocalypse spare you!

Survival protocol:
- Every survivor must rely on himself in the apocalypse! Evolve yourself, evolve in building, evolve in crafting, evolve in using armor and weapon, evolve in killing dead zombies. Each day you survive against zombies in the wild wasteland of the apocalypse makes you smarter. Each mile you outrun from zombies makes you faster. Each head you smash to pieces makes you stronger, survivor. Evolve, craft, build, explore, gather resources – learn to survive, fight for your survival! You must evolve to survive among the zombies!


- Even the best survivor will become a new threat for everyone else alive surrounded by the apocalypse zombies without a proper weapon and armor. Each time you evolve you’ll unlock more blueprints for craft new weapons and armor. Find what suits your survival best – punch, cut, pierce, smash, shoot, set them on fire, blow ALL zombies up! Make the walking zombies dead forever and survive. Crafting and building are your main resources for survival in this hardcore apocalypse!

- No matter how effective you are with your weapon, or how hard your armor is you’ll still need to rest to survive the apocalypse. Apocalypse wasteland is a difficult place for survival, so start building your own shelter against zombies! Building walls and upgrading them, building traps, crafting unpickable locks – all is helpful to protect you from the deadly zombies. Start building your own shelter to keep you safe from zombies in the wasteland. Survive your last days on earth in dead wasteland, spend your last nights in a comfy bed.

- You need resources for building your shelter and craft weapons and armor to survive. Explore and fight in the dead wasteland to gather everything you can, survivor. All resources are vital for your survival against deadly enemies! You’ll need them to build, craft and upgrade. Zombies will try to destroy your shelter and turn one more survivor into a deadman. Don’t wait, survival, explore and scavenge the dead wasteland! Survival!

- Be careful! The world is now a harsh dead wasteland full of dangerous dead zombies. Zombie lost their intelligence but gained in strength, speed, and ferocity. They WILL try to end your survival and you WILL have to evolve and fight them to survive. Upgrade your weapons and armor, survival, start crafting the best equipment and be ready to explore and fight for your survival in the apocalypse.

- Many people we getting ready for an apocalypse to come, too bad most of them turned into zombies in the end. But they left behind the dead wasteland full of places to explore and get unique resources. Survive and look for an abandoned lab, military base, bunker, shelter. Explore them before any other survivor beats you to it. If he does, you can always search for his shelter and rob him of his means for survival… Break down the shelter and danger deadly zombies will do the rest.

- Immerse yourself in this dead wasteland of the apocalypse, complete quests and get unique rewards. Do everything and anything to survive!
